html:
5.19.17  4:00 am   I like your short videos. can you get back to doing them?

     i would like to focus on things of a more medium size

5.19.17  3:58 am   how many more mental breakdowns do i need to have?? i thought i had enough already, i thought i was going somewhere. and then BAM it happens again for no apparent reason.

     sounds like you might be an expert by now
5.19.17  2:45 am   Where do you find the time to answer all of these questions?

5.19.17  2:27 am   whats a badass name?

     fred rogers

5.19.17  1:35 am   What are your thoughts on the FidgetSpinner?

     it is a great way for time travelers to know if they're in the year 2017

5.19.17  1:29 am   If u could go to one place in the world, what would it be?

     i already can go to at least one place. but i would like to go to more

5.19.17  12:48 am   When was the last time you seriously considered quitting making music/videos?

     i have never considered it
5.19.17  12:37 am   Do you just ask yourself questions and then answer them?

5.18.17  11:49 pm   Do you actually answer these?

     yes
5.18.17  11:41 pm   what should i paint

5.18.17  11:20 pm   "vacationing in the center of the earth" isn't on expert mode. Plz fix

     yes it is. that's the only place it is.

5.18.17  11:10 pm   How much music is too much music?

     it depends on how much you want

5.18.17  11:09 pm   I've decided to put my pillows on the other end of my bed so I can sleep facing the other wall now. Do you think this is a positive life change?

     oh hell yeah, especially if the new way is better

5.18.17  11:03 pm   If you use it in your next video, would your next chord be Dsus2/F#?

     i've been trying to move away from that one. in fact, i think i actually did a video featuring that chord, even in that key. although i just called it D which was kind of an inside joke i guess

5.18.17  11:02 pm   I think I've finally found a cluster you hadn't used. AMaj7add4omit5/G# . (G# C# D A)

     you may be right, although i probably came really close to using something like that somewhere around either "broke again" or "sike"

5.18.17  11:02 pm   since hotewig is finished, are you working on a new project right now and going to drop crazy hints again?

     oh hell yeah

5.18.17  10:54 pm   how do i have more ideas

     everything is an idea

5.18.17  10:41 pm   How long does it normally take you to edit a video with all those really col effects?

     anywhere from 1 minute to 11 months, depending on what video

5.18.17  10:20 pm   What's your favorite soda?

     minna

5.18.17  10:17 pm   did you get your youtube plaques yet

     no

5.18.17  10:02 pm   Will you start posting more?

     i complete projects as quickly as possible, and post them when they are done. i am doing it as fast as i can, and have been for several years now

5.18.17  9:56 pm   should people get beat up for stating their beliefs?

     probably not

5.18.17  9:52 pm   Are you working on any more "full songs", such as "I don't want to go to school"?

     to a greater degree than you can imagine. unless you already know

5.18.17  9:35 pm   how many cubic centimeters are in a cubic meter

     a million

5.18.17  9:29 pm   A favicon would really help us though. When youre like me and you have a lot of tabs, the favicon is the first thing we look at to quickly identify the tab. Sorry about this not being a question I hope you dont mind. To compensate, right after submitting this comment, Ill ask a question.

     ah, that's actually a really good reason. here's my reasoning: i never had an icon or a logo when i made the website. the website was made before the youtube or any of those other channels. i originally wasn't going to use other sites. but i sort of got pressured into it. and all those sites are designed for you to have a profile image, so i had to come up with something. so i never really wanted to use the umbrella, i didn't want to use anything. i just came up with it because i had to use something, and that seemed the most reasonable out of all the options i had. so to use the umbrella on this site seems kind of like taking a step backwards somehow. i would possibly consider doing a favicon but i don't know yet what it would be

5.18.17  9:22 pm   Been watchin' hotewig everyday as promised. Decided to focus solely on the score without quoting lines or singing along to jingles (the new arrivals one and the Turkey one almost got me). The question: How did you get so skilled in matching sounds to visual actions? The sounds you pick for zooming, panning, an empire expanding, a picture getting smaller, even an arrow being drawn are so precise and perfect every time. Have you always just heard sounds accompanying non-auditory actions in your head? Or did you learn it from somewhere like watching cartoons, for example, which tend to do that a lot?

     just experience. i've been underscoring all my videos for as long as i've been making videos. it's kind of a secret weapon to make people think what they're seeing is more interesting than it actually is. that is the power of music

5.18.17  9:16 pm   How was your reaction when Club Penguin shut down?!

     i never got a chance to react when it was made in the first place. i think i was busy working on videos the entire time

5.18.17  9:14 pm   what is your favorite thing ever?????

     i like the unique qualities of each one

5.18.17  9:10 pm   Why do you always comment: oh hell yeah. Just wondering :p

     i don't. i only say that to things i strongly agree with

5.18.17  9:06 pm   did u title hotewig just because of its shortened name

     hotewig is just an abbreviation for history of the entire world, i guess. i haven't really used it anywhere, except for file names

5.18.17  8:38 pm   how do i be happy?

     it might be a surprise

5.18.17  8:38 pm   why do we call it the moon, when there's more moons

     because that was the first one we knew about. and also the only one we have at our planet (i think)

5.18.17  8:37 pm   which history of the world is correct, the q&a history of the world or the history of the entire world, i guess?

     it is the same topic, expressed in 2 vastly different time lengths. both attempt to be accurate, while also implementing a generous dosage of whimsy

5.18.17  8:29 pm   maybe it's the steady quarter note bassline paired with the rollicking drums, or the way the chords resolve super cleanly and standardly, i'm not sure, but "new canaan" always gives me this air of traveling that isn't quite as present in your other songs? what i was wondering though is, do the other three songs written in a similar manner follow those listed tropes (conversely, do they have a similar feel to them)? very vague question, i'm sorry, but "new canaan" is one of my fav songs of all time and i'm really excited to hear more songs written in a similar vein! thank you!

     i think the traveling feeling is in the writing. and a large percentage of my writing in 2009 (especially spring/summer 2009) had that feel

5.18.17  8:27 pm   Do you think jazz as a standalone art form is dead? Has it mostly been subsumed into mainstream pop?

     jazz was originally the name for pop, in the 1920s. since then it has taken on a variety of different meanings. i'm not sure if that answers your question
5.18.17  8:20 pm   If I forget the question mark, does it still count

5.18.17  8:19 pm   Do you get tired sometimes?

     yes, almost once a day it seems like

5.18.17  8:18 pm   did you ever decide to go on an adventure somewhere all alone

     oh hell yeah!

      and felt like an insane person for doing so?

     no, to me that feels professional as hell

     and if so do you have any advice? asking for a friend

     do the adventure, unless you don't think you want to

5.18.17  8:13 pm   If someone wants to learn a musical instrumentment should they take lessons or do you advocate independent thinking?

     it depends if they wanna learn the really good stuff

5.18.17  8:11 pm   is your car worse than when it was worse than when it was bad?

     it is getting steadily worse, over time

5.18.17  7:56 pm   Would you ever be open to the idea of doing long songs as opposed to medium/short ones? Like 6:00 - 9:00 minutes, not right at this moment, but just something down the line?

     the time ranges i'm most interested in now are between :30 and 3:30, but especially between 2:00 and 3:30

5.18.17  7:25 pm   what if everything was spiders

     i think everything is spiders

5.18.17  7:13 pm   What do you think of space?

     it's nice you can be places

5.18.17  6:48 pm   what's your favorite table

     time
5.18.17  6:33 pm   If you had a different name, what would it be?

5.18.17  5:59 pm   are you a brony?

     i've never been tested

5.18.17  5:55 pm   do you ever feel insecure about how you appear and come across to others, and if so how do you deal with that

     it's kind of like a water slide. just try to keep moving forward

5.18.17  5:47 pm   why did you have to make the history of the world video? (thank you tho, i love it and it was great and fantastic and thank you)

     it seemed like a good idea at the time

5.18.17  5:37 pm   can you make your next song 1 minute and 42 seconds? thanks

     i will see what i can do

5.18.17  5:33 pm   do you think you are able to reach your goal?

     i am working on it
